title: Material Template
subtitle: Material Design

text.design: Material Design is a design language developed by Google in 2014. It’s used to create visually appealing and highly functional digital interfaces for websites and mobile applications.

items: Mobile Apps Android apps often follow Material Design principles to create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces.
Web Applications Many modern web applications incorporate Material Design for its clean, user-friendly interface.
Cross-Platform Consistency Because the design language is adaptable, it’s used to create consistent experiences across multiple devices and screen sizes.
